subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A.’s decision to delay suspensions for Terrelle Pryor, Dan Herron and DeVier Posey played a major role in Ohio State’s win in the Sugar Bowl.
snippet: The N.C.A.A.’s decision to delay suspensions for Terrelle Pryor, Dan Herron and DeVier Posey played a major role in Ohio State’s win in the Sugar Bowl.
